discussion.author: herbelin
discussion.comment: This backward-compatible PR can be merged. Actually, #11368 being now merged to Coq, it would be better to merge it without too much delay if possible in order to remain synchronous with Coq CI. Thanks in advance.

discussion.author: ppedrot
discussion.comment: Maybe a named ping to @gares is more efficient?
